column5: @Name SHALL define the partition key that SHALL be filled with the value that is calculated from @ValueFormat and @ValueTemplate.
Formatting value for combining values from @ValueTemplate into a dynamic result value.

Exactly one Expr element with a matching @Name SHALL be specified for each variable in @ValueTemplate that is NOT defined in the parent IdentificationField/@ValueTemplate and NOT defined in ?Table E.1 Predefined variables used in @XXXTemplate. Expr SHALL NOT be specified in an IdentificationField/MetadataMap.
